effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.platinum: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.
flavor_text.platinum: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.
